v1.19.0.description: updates flow dialog to have a max width of 640px
fixes an issue where dialog was respecting window width in IE at small viewports
fixes dismission interaction model for each dialog type.
adds the ability to hide arbitrary areas of content from screen readers when the dialog is being shown

v1.18.0.description: changes position of lightbox close button

v1.16.0.description: adds onShown and onHidden notifications to IDialogSubscriber
fixes a continuous update loop on IE10

v1.11.0.description: updates behavior to close dialog on button actions when not using lightbox option

v1.8.0.description: updates sass to remove interpolation dependency
fixes issue with dialog background color and opacity
updates z-index to fix an issue where the current universal header was overlaying the dialog component
